title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.2 - Assignment of counsel in Family Court
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.2 - Assignment of counsel in Family Court

State Regulations

Counsel to be assigned pursuant to the

Family Court Act, section 262, shall be selected from such panels as have been
established by the assigned counsel plan in the First Judicial

Department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
611.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
